item.description:
Beginners Party
Come learn to Salsa, Foxtrot and Swing at this open dance party with mini-classes till 10pm. Only for Beginner dancers, you'll have an opportunity to sign up for special discounted lessons at the end of the night
We play all Ballroom music, including Salsa, Swing, Tango, Waltz and more. Sign up for a partner at www.LetsDanceBranford.com or bring a friend.
8-10pm
$5
Free for Newcomers
Bring a Friend who signs up and you will receive a free private lesson
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the studio by 8pm, sign in with Sherri at the front desk and she'll call me over.
item.why: Dancing is good exercise, very sociable and a lot of fun; that's why it is the subject of one of the top rated TV shows.
item.name: Beginners Ballroom Party
